name: Blocking Cubes but it's in 2D
description:
A downloadable game where you try to avoid cube coming from above in 2d.

---------- Developper's message ----------

I just made this game to learn more about Godot, it's basically a copy of https://roucasse.itch.io/blocking-cubes but in 2D, because why not.

------------------------------------------------

> Story

The blue cylinder is rolling, but the red cubes are trying to block him !

Save him for as long as you can !

> How to play

Press one of the key to reverse the position of all the cubes of the corresponding row.

  • Cubes outside the ground will go into the ground.
  • Cubes into the ground will go out of the ground.

Every cube of the line needs to be into the ground to avoid touching the cylinder.

If the cylinder touch one of the cubes, you lose.

The goal is to get the highest score possible.

> Controls

(From Left to Right row)

By default :

  • Easy Mode :
    • D | F | J | K
  • Normal Mode :
    • S | D | F | J | K | L
  • Hard Mode :
    • S | D | F | Space | J | K | L

You can change those config in the settings panel.

> Known bugs

  • Weird glitch happening for the button and text, i have literally no idea why they happen.
  • button getting bigger with some buttons when configuring keys (Can fix that, but the way i made them would take me a lot of time, it's not really annoying so it's no big deal if this is not fixed)

> Personal Score (20 may 2019)

  • Easy : 1460
  • Normal : 1542
  • Hard : 1582
